name: Xiphus
description: The Xiphus is a small yet formidable fey creature with exceptional agility and a chaotic demeanor. It is known for its high Dexterity and quick movements, making it hard to target in combat.
memorable: Renowned for its ability to absorb lightning damage and convert it to healing, alongside its capability to manipulate time in combat.
goals: To evade danger while inflicting damage on its foes, often using lightning attacks and strategic manipulation.
relations: Typically found in the company of other chaotic fey creatures or alone as a trickster in the wilderness.
environment: Commonly found in wild, chaotic outdoor settings, where its fey nature can thrive.
strengths: High Dexterity grants excellent evasiveness and attack bonuses, along with damage immunity to lightning.
weaknesses: Although agile, it is still vulnerable to non-lightning attacks and can be overwhelmed if outnumbered.
attacks: Utilizes a Hidden Dagger for swift melee or ranged strikes that deal piercing and lightning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Lightning Absorption, allowing it to regenerate health whenever it takes lightning damage.
equipment: Hidden Dagger, used for its main attacks.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet, enhancing its ability to navigate in darkness.
skills: Highly skilled in acrobatics and stealth, showcasing exceptional agility.
additional_information: Ability to dodge damage completely through Evasion.
Siphon Time grants tactical advantages in combat.
Startling Speed imposes disadvantage on attackers targeting it after moving.
Can temporarily borrow life force to avoid lethal damage.
Regains Borrowed Time after resting, allowing for repeated use in multiple encounters.
test_queries: swift fey creature with lightning attacks
small chaotic fey that absorbs lightning
agile fey using hidden dagger in combat
trickster fey manipulating time in battle
fey with lightning damage immunity and evasion abilities
